name: Dusthaven Village
description: A small oasis village that serves as the last outpost before the great desert. Adobe buildings cluster around a precious well, and date palms provide shade from the harsh sun.

center.name: Oasis Center
center.description: The heart of the village centers around the life-giving well. Villagers in desert robes go about their daily tasks while keeping watchful eyes on the horizon for sandstorms.

buildings.name: The Mirage's Rest
buildings.description: A cool, shaded inn built around the oasis where desert travelers rest.

buildings.name: Desert Walker's Supplies
buildings.description: A shop specializing in desert survival gear and supplies.

buildings.name: Shrine of the Sacred Well
buildings.description: A modest shrine dedicated to the water spirits that bless the oasis.

west.name: Western Edge
west.description: The western edge of the village where the last shade gives way to the open desert. Caravans assemble here before making the dangerous journey.

buildings.name: Caravan Assembly Point
buildings.description: Where desert caravans gather supplies and travelers before heading into the wasteland.
